main.name: Julio Cesar Renteria
main.description: Experienced in Management, Inbound & Outbound Logistics, Inventory Control, and Quality Assurance. Proficient skills in automating processes, developing talent and complex problem-solving
main.bio: Chemical Engineer & Data Analyst with experience in Management, Inbound & Outbound Logistics, Inventory Control, and Quality Assurance. Proficient skills in automating processes, developing talent and complex problem-solving.
main.bio2: I believe in building innovative customer-centric processes to create true value, a customer being anyone who is affected or participates in the production of a good or service. All while maintaining high-quality standards.
main.bio3: Learning and Deep Diving is my superpower, I’m always curious about new possibilities and eager to explore them.
main.bio4: I'm extremely passionate about Tech, Business and Industry 4.0, my professional purpose is to be part of a growing tech company open to innovation where I can apply my knowledge and ideas for processes or project launches. Always looking to learn and grow as a leader.
main.contactmessage: I'm always open to new proyects. Lets work together! Leave a message:

education.description: Intensive 9 week course in Data Analytics

education.school: Monterrey Institute of Technology and Higher Education

work.title: Quality Assurance & Inventory Control - Area Manager
work.description: Supervised a group of 30 associates on 3 shifts.
work.description2: Oversaw the inventory control operation. Including inventory count labor, inventory recording and  management.
work.description3: Solving multi-area problems that compromised the inventory or process' quality.
work.description4: Work with other areas in order to implement new processes.
work.description5: Monitored daily, weekly and monthly KPIs and analysis to identify opportunities for improvement.
work.description6: Assisting in the development of policies, processes, and standards

work.title: Engineer Internship
work.description: Energy consumption management for physical retal, hospitality, medical, and entertainment establishments.
work.description2: Energy savings Data Analysis and Forecast.
work.description3: Developing strategies to reduce energy consumption.
work.description4: Researching new technologies to streamline the energy-saving process.

testimonials.text: Julio has the superpower of being a fast learner, he could dive into a problem by himself and find solutions for peculiar situations. Julio is also a problem solver who provided full support to the Outbound team during the peak season, teaching and coaching associates and managers.
Julio is someone highly committed to their work that has obtained the necessary character to “fight” for the objectives of his department.
